source.distractors:
printf "%d and %d are even.\n" 4 2
printf "%d and %d are odd.\n" 3 1
source.guidance:
| Command                                      | Output                                      |
|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| **`printf "%d and %d are even.\n" 2 4`**   | ![even output](.guides/img/even.png)        |
| **`echo -e "State\nCapital\nPopulation"`** | ![newline output](.guides/img/newline.png)  |
| **`printf "%d and %d are odd.\n" 1 3`**    | ![odd output](.guides/img/odd.png)          |
| **`echo -e "State\tCapital\tPopulation"`** | ![tab output](.guides/img/tab.png)          |
source.instructions: Click the button below to submit.
source.name: Formatting Output
source.text:
| Command                                      | Output                                      |
|----------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------|
| <<<printf "%d and %d are even.\n" 2 4>>>   | ![even output](.guides/img/even.png)        |
| <<<echo -e "State\nCapital\nPopulation">>> | ![newline output](.guides/img/newline.png)  |
| <<<printf "%d and %d are odd.\n" 1 3>>>    | ![odd output](.guides/img/odd.png)          |
| <<<echo -e "State\tCapital\tPopulation">>> | ![tab output](.guides/img/tab.png)          |
